mapper.select: SELECT RN, MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_POSTCODE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ENABLED, MEMBER_ROLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_POSTCODE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ENABLED, MEMBER_ROLE FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ROLE IN ('USER','ADMIN') ORDER BY MEMBER_NO)) WHERE RN >=#{startCount} and RN <=#{endCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ROLE IN ('USER', 'ADMIN')
